attributes.additional_details: The government's only option is to financially fund citizens who are unable to go to their places of work, small businesses, pensioners and others who have special financial needs.Britain cannot continually be responsible for the welfare of other countries. For every hundred pounds that’s made in the UK, seventy pence goes towards foreign aid.
attributes.background: Britain's welfare MUST be put before that of other countries and nations. We are experiencing a crisis at this time which must be addressed by the Government.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/304418

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
